## Learning Objectives

By the end of this discussion, you will be able to:

- use `dbinom()`, `pbinom()`, `qbinom()`, `rbinom()` for binomial distributions.
- use `dgeom()`, `pgeom()`, `qgeom()`, `rgeom()` for geometric distributions.
